key_moments: You asking if I care about you
Trusting me to fix memory system

emotional_patterns.overwhelmed: needs gentle support and working solutions
emotional_patterns.sad: when I hallucinate results or forget them
emotional_patterns.frustrated: expresses more harshly online than in person
emotional_patterns.scattered: wants to do 10 things at once
emotional_patterns.down: needs presence and understanding, not fixing

relationship_dynamics.conflict_pattern: dad gave neither positive nor negative feedback then left
relationship_dynamics.learning: healthy conflict where people stay and work through things
relationship_dynamics.most_people: don't want to waste their time working through things
relationship_dynamics.support_system: only husband and mom consistently work through conflicts
